Name: the Rim Collection
Description: The Rim Collection is a small nation-state emerging from the ashes of the Rim Worlds Republic. Founded by citizens yearning to revive the Republic's pre-Amaris ideals, the Collection fiercely guards its independence.
ReputationStatements: I wouldn't turn to you unless I had no other option. Well, I have no other option. Do this if you care, and maybe we'll talk about paying.
We don't like you, and you don't like us, but still, I think we can do business. Want to change that?
Hello, Commander. You need money; we need work done. Take a look at this contract.
The Rim Collection is in need of some supplemental merchandise, and we've heard you're competent. Care to take a look?.
We've got a good thing going here, Commander; let's keep the roll going. Take a gander at this contract—I think you'll find it satisfactory.
Commander, the Rim has need of you again. We've got a great contract for you, and we hope you can take care of it for us. The compensation is good, like always.
We count on you like we count on Able's Aces, Commander. You're one of our own at this point. Do this contract, and rewards will flow as always.
MissionSuccessStatements: Great show, Commander! The Rim is very pleased with your efforts. I've remitted payment; you should receive it shortly, and don't forget to come around again sometime.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You gave it a solid try there, Commander. You didn't get it done, but you did your damnest. Sometimes it doesn't work out. Thanks for the effort, at least.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Commander, this effort is embarrassing for both of us. Don't bother contacting us for payment—it's not coming. Do better next time.
